hebrewText: ב: הִנֵּ֨ה אֵ֧ל יְשׁוּעָתִ֛י אֶבְטַ֖ח וְלֹ֣א אֶפְחָ֑ד
englishText: ﻿And in that day thou shalt say:
‘I will give thanks unto Thee, O LORD;
For though Thou was angry with me,
Thine anger is turned away, and Thou comfortest me.
2: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and will not be afraid;
For GOD the LORD is my strength and song;
And He is become my salvation.’
3: Therefore with joy shall ye draw water
Out of the wells of salvation.
4: And in that day shall ye say:
‘Give thanks unto the LORD, proclaim His name,
Declare His doings among the peoples,
This is made known in all the earth.
6: Cry aloud and shout, thou inhabitant of Zion,
For great is the Holy One of Israel in the midst of thee.’
